portrait_l.name: lemmy
portrait_l.sjis: 用がすんだのなら 早くどこかへ行ってもらえないかな
portrait_l.ascii: If you've finished your business, could you hurry along elsewhere?

portrait_l.ascii: For and Mr. Lemmy to fight like that

info.sjis: 召喚獣トロッコに乗車の際には 足下に十分ご注意下さい
info.ascii: When boarding the railcar, please watch your step.
